remarks: Distributive law for scalar product (left-distributivity). ( ~ ax-hvdistr1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
lmodvsdi.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsdi.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvsdi.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsdi.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsdi.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsdi $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( R e. K /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( R .x. ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( R .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. Y ) ) ) $.
